full_description:
MSI MAG SHIELD M301 Micro ATX Tower Gaming Case

The MSI MAG SHIELD M301 Micro ATX Tower Gaming Case is a compact and efficient solution for gamers seeking a powerful yet space-saving build. Compatible with Micro-ATX and Mini-ITX motherboards, this case offers excellent versatility for building various gaming setups. The I/O ports include 2x USB 1.0 Type-A, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1x Audio, and 1x Mic, providing convenient connectivity options. The MSI MAG SHIELD M301 comes with drive mount support for 1x 2.5" and 1x 3.5" drives, allowing you to store your games and data effectively. It offers 4 expansion slots, suitable for accommodating multiple components and add-ons. With a maximum GPU length of 250mm and a maximum CPU cooler height of 160mm, this case ensures compatibility with a wide range of graphics cards and cooling solutions. The case supports fan sizes of 2x 120mm at the front and 1x 120mm at the rear. It comes with a pre-installed non-LED fan of 1x 120mm at the rear for efficient airflow. The MAG SHIELD M301 can also accommodate a 120mm radiator at the rear, further enhancing cooling performance.

full_description:
MSI MAG PANO M100R PZ Micro- ATX Tower Gaming Case

The MSI MAG PANO M100R PZ Micro-ATX Tower Gaming Case is a sophisticated and versatile solution designed for gaming enthusiasts and PC builders who seek both high functionality and striking aesthetics in their setups. This case stands out with its integration of advanced connectivity options, including a USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C port that ensures high-speed data transmission when paired with a compatible MSI motherboard, streamlining performance and data management. The MAG PANO M100R PZ is its 270-degree panoramic tempered glass panel, which provides an expansive view of the internal components, allowing users to showcase their ARGB lighting setups while maintaining a clean and organized appearance. This panoramic display, combined with support for back-connect PROJECT ZERO motherboards, enhances cable management by routing cables through the back of the case, ensuring a tidy and uncluttered build environment. With room for ten 120 mm system fans and support for up to a 360 mm AIO liquid cooler on top, the casing has excellent cooling capabilities. This guarantees that during long gaming sessions, even the most demanding components may be maintained at ideal temperatures. A reverse-blade fan on the side also helps to increase airflow and enhance overall heat management. Users may easily customize fan speeds and lighting effects using an integrated 1-to-4 ARGB-PWM control board, which makes it possible to create synchronized and dynamic lighting displays across their system. A magnetic dust filter at the bottom of the casing makes maintenance simple. It is easily removable for cleaning, ensuring that the internal components are kept clear of dust and debris. The MSI MAG PANO M100R PZ is also designed with DIY enthusiasts in mind, offering ample space for cable management and component installation. This makes the assembly process straightforward and enjoyable, providing flexibility for various build configurations. The case's emphasis on ARGB lighting, combined with its modern design, allows users to create a visually stunning showcase for their internal components. The MSI MAG PANO M100R PZ Micro-ATX Tower Gaming Case provides a perfect blend of functionality and aesthetic appeal, making it an ideal choice for those looking to build a high-performance gaming rig or a custom PC with a striking visual impact.

full_description:
MSI MPG SEKIRA 100P Mid-Tower Gaming Case

The MSI MPG SEKIRA 100P is a mid-tower gaming case that offers a range of features to optimize system performance and ventilation. The case is capable of supporting up to 6 system fans, which ensures stable performance throughout the entire system. Additionally, the case features three dust filters to prevent dust from entering the system, maintaining its longevity. The top vent lid of the case provides additional airflow and protection for the system, while the magnetic filter on top is designed to provide an easy uninstalling and cleaning experience for users. The case supports a range of motherboard form factors, including E-ATX, ATX, M-ATX, and Mini ITX. The case also comes with a range of I/O ports, including 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C, 1 x Audio, and 1 x Mic. It has two 3.5" (compatible with 2.5") and two 2.5" drive bays, as well as seven case expansion slots. This MSI MPG SEKIRA 100P has a maximum GPU length of 340mm and a maximum CPU cooler length of 170mm. It supports a standard ATX power supply, with a maximum length of 250mm (without the 3.5" HDD tray installed). It comes with pre-installed front and rear system fans, with the front supporting 3 x 120mm or 2 x 140mm fans, the top supporting 2 x 120mm or 2 x 140mm fans, and the rear supporting 1 x 120mm fan. It also has a range of radiator layout options, including front support for 120/140/240/280/360mm radiators, top support for 120/240mm radiators, and rear support for 120mm radiators.

full_description:
MSI MAG VAMPIRIC 300R Mid-Tower Gaming Case

The MSI MAG VAMPIRIC 300R Mid-Tower Gaming Case is a visually appealing and long-lasting case with a plethora of functions for gamers and PC enthusiasts alike. The LED light strip on the front panel can show a broad spectrum of colors, making it an eye-catching accent to any setting. Furthermore, MSI Mystic Light fully supports the case's ARGB lighting, providing customers complete control over their system's illumination. The MAG VAMPIRIC 300R also has a strong VGA support bracket that can accommodate graphics cards of various weights and sizes. This, combined with the case's capacity to accommodate up to 7 fans, makes it a great choice for high-performance gaming systems requiring exceptional cooling. The case also provides exceptional accessibility and visibility thanks to its 3mm hinged tempered glass swinging window, which allows users to readily observe the components of their system while also assuring long-term durability. Furthermore, the case supports a variety of motherboard form factors, including ATX, Micro-ATX, and Mini-ITX. The MAG VAMPIRIC 300R includes two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, one USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C port, an audio-out connector, and a mic-in input. It also has a drive mount for two 2.5" or two 3.5" hard drives, seven expansion slots, and a maximum GPU length of 380 mm / 15 inches. The case offers a choice of fan and radiator sizes for customers wishing to build a bespoke cooling system, with fan sizes including 3 x 120 mm / 3 x 140 mm for the front, 3 x 120 mm / 2 x 140 mm for the top, and 1 x 120 mm for the back. The case comes with a single pre-installed ARGB fan. Moreover, radiators up to 360 mm in diameter are supported for both the front and top, with a 120 mm radiator support for the back.

MSI MPG VELOX 100P AIRFLOW Mid-Tower Gaming Case

The MSI MPG VELOX 100P AIRFLOW Mid-Tower Gaming Case is a powerful and efficient cooling-focused system. It has a design that is optimized for abundant and effective ventilation, with vents strategically placed throughout the casing. This makes it ideal for high-end gaming and other demanding applications that need efficient cooling. The case includes several elements that improve cooling, including a side air vent that can handle up to two fans or a 240mm radiator. It also includes an additional vertical GPU bracket, which lets you place your graphics card vertically for increased cooling and aesthetics. The MPG VELOX 100 Series supports up to seven fans and features a 3mm hinged tempered glass swinging window for outstanding durability and simple system access. The case is compatible with a variety of MB Form Factors, including ATX, M-ATX, and ITX. The case measures 474 x 231 x 490 mm (W x D x H) or 18.7 x 9.1 x 19.3 inches (W x D x H), whereas its measurements without Feet/Protrusions/Screws are 420 x 220 x 460 mm (D x W x H) or 16.5 x 8.7 x 18.1 inches (D x W x H). It also contains an I/O port with two USB 3.2 Gen 1 port, one USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type C port, one Audio port, and one Mic port. This case includes driver bays for two 2.5" SSDs and two 3.5" HDDs, as well as VGA card support up to 380mm or 15 inches and a CPU cooler, supporting up to 175mm or 6.9 inches. A regular ATX power supply with a maximum length of 220mm can be used (without a 3.5" HDD tray installed). The MSI MPG VELOX 100P AIRFLOW Mid-Tower Gaming Case can accommodate 120mm x 3 or 140mm x 3 front fans, 120mm x 3 or 140mm x 2 top fans, and a 120mm x 1 rear fan. It can accommodate two 120mm fans on the side. The radiator configuration comprises 120/140/240/280/360mm radiators in the front and top, as well as a 120mm radiator in the back. It can fit 120/240mm radiators on the side. This MSI MPG VELOX 100P AIRFLOW Mid-Tower Gaming Case is a great choice for anybody seeking a powerful and efficient gaming case with great cooling capabilities. Its feature set and customizability make it an excellent choice for high-performance computing, gaming, and other demanding applications.

full_description:
MSI MPG QUIETUDE 100S Mid-Tower Gaming Case

The MSI MPG QUIETUDE 100S Mid-Tower Gaming Case is a high-end computer case built for gamers that place a premium on performance and aesthetics. This gaming case's elegant style and smart functions are likely to improve the gaming experience. The MEG SILENT GALE P12 fan, which is exclusive to MSI, is one of the MPG QUIETUDE 100S's standout characteristics. This fan is designed to produce minimum noise while providing effective airflow. This means that even during intense gaming sessions, the PC maintains cool while functioning silently. The fan speed adjustment button is another standout feature of the MPG QUIETUDE 100S. Users may use this button to set the fan speed to 100%, 70%, or 0% RPM, depending on their needs. This function guarantees that the fan runs at the ideal level for the activity at hand, offering maximum cooling while producing the least amount of noise. The MPG QUIETUDE 100S includes three panels with sound-dampening foams throughout the system to significantly minimize noise levels. These foams efficiently block out noise, resulting in a more peaceful overall experience. Another feature that distinguishes the MPG QUIETUDE 100S from other gaming cases is the VGA support bracket. This bracket can support graphics cards of various weights and sizes, providing stability and reducing sagging. Furthermore, the MPG QUIETUDE 100S can accommodate up to 7 fans, giving consumers a wide range of cooling customization possibilities. The MSI MPG QUIETUDE 100S Mid-Tower Gaming Case is a fantastic choice for anybody wishing to construct a high-performance computer system, whether you're a dedicated gamer or a casual user.

full_description:
MSI MPG VELOX 100R Mid-Tower Gaming Case

The MSI MPG VELOX 100R Mid-Tower Gaming Case is a powerhouse designed to elevate your battle station with unmatched power and style. Its ventilated front panel with tempered glass showcases mesmerizing ARGB lighting effects, fully customizable with MSI Mystic Light. The Insta-Light Loop button makes controlling the lighting a breeze. Enjoy efficient cooling with side air vents, 4 pre-installed fans, and support for up to 7 fans or a 240mm radiator. The MSI MPG VELOX 100R Gaming Case accommodates 360mm radiators or 3x 120mm fans on the top and front, and vertical GPU mounting is possible with a riser cable. It offers a hinged tempered glass window, magnetic dust filter, front USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type C port, and convenient I/O ports. With ample drive mounts, support for large graphics cards and CPU coolers, and compatibility with various motherboard sizes, the MPG VELOX 100R ensures you can build your gaming rig to perfection.

full_description:
MSI MAG VAMPIRIC 100R Mid-Tower Gaming Case

The MSI MAG VAMPIRIC 100R supports ATX / mATX / Mini-ITX motherboards. The front mesh panel allows air to flow into the case easily without obstruction, providing the best system cooling performance. The front mesh panel has been built to effectively let in air for maximum ventilation while stunning onlookers with its striking design. It comes with an Insta-Light loop button so you can quickly control the lighting effects. It features a side panel of 4mm tempered glass, a 120 mm RGB fan, reserved cooling space, and a front USB 3.2 Gen 1. It has 2 x 2.5" + 2 x 3.5" (1 x compatible with 2.5") drive bays and 6 expansion slots. You can install up to 6x system fans, providing ventilation and stable performance to the whole system. It has a 4mm tinted tempered glass side panel, making it ideal for showcasing your build with (RGB) lighting. It comes with a 120mm system fan in front and a 120mm ARGB fan included at the rear. The case has a magnetic filter on the top side that is designed to give users the best experience in un-installing and cleaning. It has no warranty.
